title: I keep disconnecting and connecting in games
body: This whole week I have been disconnecting and connecting over and over while in a chat room and google chrome open. League disconnects and google and discord are working properly while I am talking to my friends. I think it has something to do with league. Can you please look into this riot?

replies.body: It doesn't look like we've had any widespread server issues today, so let's go ahead and troubleshoot some of those [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is configured in the best way. Pay special attention to configuring DNS, port forwarding, and checking firewalls!
